meanings.definition: A group of similar things that belong together or are used together.
meanings.sent1: She collected different sets of stamps for her collection.
meanings.sent2: The toy store sells sets of building blocks for children to play with.
meanings.sent3: At the party, each guest received a set of matching party favors.
meanings.sent4: The forest was a set of diverse trees, creating a beautiful landscape.
meanings.sent5: The artist painted a set of colorful flowers in the garden scene.

meanings.definition: To put or place something in a particular position or direction.
meanings.sent1: He sets the table for dinner every evening.
meanings.sent2: The sun sets in the west, painting the sky with beautiful colors.
meanings.sent3: She sets the vase carefully on the shelf, avoiding any accidents.
meanings.sent4: The coach sets the players in their positions before the game starts.
meanings.sent5: The teacher sets the books neatly on the shelf for the students.

meanings.definition: To establish or fix something in a particular way.
meanings.sent1: The company sets the rules for all employees to follow.
meanings.sent2: She sets her alarm clock every night before going to bed.
meanings.sent3: He sets the record straight about what really happened that day.
meanings.sent4: The architect sets the foundation of the building to ensure stability.
meanings.sent5: The chef sets the oven temperature for the perfect roast.
